ISSUE.TITLE: Strange characters block editing of subscriptions
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: We had a customer with a strange name including letter "Ã¤" when we tried editing his subscription we received i thing a 404 or a 504 i cannot remember. I've changed the name into 'a' and then it worked.
